billing_confirm_termination_information_: The service will be cancelled once you confirm. This will result in all of the data associated with the service (including backups) being cancelled automatically and immediately. This action cannot be undone. Before you confirm your cancellation, you will need to take the necessary measures to conserve your data. OVHcloud does not accept any responsibility in this regard.

Once you confirm the cancellation, please note that any data linked to this service and any backups will be permanently deleted. You will need to take the necessary measures to conserve your data before you confirm your cancellation. Once the process has been launched, it cannot be cancelled. OVHcloud does not accept any responsibility for data loss in this scenario.
billing_confirm_termination_question_rea: You have opted to cancel your service. To help us improve our service, please tell us the main reason you have chosen to cancel.
billing_confirm_termination_question_fut: What do you plan to do?
billing_confirm_termination_question_com: Please tell us more about the reasons you have chosen to cancel this service
billing_confirm_termination_reason_LACK_: The quality of service (outages, incidents) does not meet my expectations.
billing_confirm_termination_reason_NOT_N: The project associated with this product/service has changed, or is complete.
billing_confirm_termination_reason_TOO_H: The online support (customer service, guides, chat) did not enable me to manage my services properly.
billing_confirm_termination_reason_FEATU: The productâ€™s features did not fit my needs.
billing_confirm_termination_reason_PRODU: The product is over-scaled/under-scaled for my requirements.
The tools for managing my services were not convenient for me.
billing_confirm_termination_reason_NOT_E: A lack of reward for customer loyalty (loyalty programme, degressive pricing, etc.)
billing_confirm_termination_future_use_N: I do not plan to replace this service.
billing_confirm_termination_future_use_S: I plan to sign up to a different OVHcloud service.
I plan to sign up to another service from a competitor.
I plan to sign up to a similar service from a competitor.
billing_confirm_termination_success: Your service has been cancelled. You will be sent an email confirmation in the next few minutes. Please feel free to contact our support team if you have any queries.
billing_confirm_termination_error: An error has occurred cancelling the service. {{ message }}
